verses.verse: On that day<WH3117> King<WH4428> Ahasuerus<WH325> gave<WH5414> the house<WH1004> of Haman,<WH2001> the enemy<WH6887> of the Jews,<WH3064> to Queen<WH4436> Esther;<WH635> and Mordecai<WH4782> came<WH935> before<WH6440> the king,<WH4428> for Esther<WH635> had disclosed<WH5046> what<WH4100> he was to her.

And the king<WH4428> took<WH5493> off<WH5493> his signet<WH2885> ring<WH2885> which<WH834> he had taken<WH5674> away<WH5674> from Haman,<WH2001> and gave<WH5414> it to Mordecai.<WH4782> And Esther<WH635> set<WH7760> Mordecai<WH4782> over<WH5921> the house<WH1004> of Haman.<WH2001>

Then Esther<WH635> spoke<WH1696> again<WH3254> to the king,<WH4428> fell<WH5307> at his feet,<WH7272> wept,<WH1058> and implored<WH2603> him to avert<WH5674> the evil<WH9567> [scheme] of Haman<WH2001> the Agagite<WH91> and his plot<WH4284> which<WH834> he had devised<WH2803> against<WH5921> the Jews.<WH3064>
And the king<WH4428> extended<WH3447> the golden<WH2091> scepter<WH8275> to Esther.<WH635> So Esther<WH635> arose<WH6965> and stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> the king.<WH4428>

Then she said,<WH559> "If<WH518> it pleases<WH5921> <WH2895> the king<WH4428> and if<WH518> I have found<WH4672> favor<WH2580> before<WH6440> him and the matter<WH1697> [seems] proper<WH3787> to the king<WH4428> and I am pleasing<WH2896> in his sight,<WH5869> let it be written<WH3789> to revoke<WH7725> the letters<WH5612> devised<WH4284> by Haman,<WH2001> the son<WH1121> of Hammedatha<WH9097> the Agagite,<WH91> which<WH834> he wrote<WH3789> to destroy the Jews<WH6> who<WH3064> are in all<WH834> the king's provinces.<WH3605>

"For how<WH9010> can<WH3201> I endure<WH3201> to see<WH7200> the calamity<WH9567> which<WH834> shall befall<WH4672> my people,<WH5971> and how<WH9010> can<WH3201> I endure<WH3201> to see<WH7200> the destruction<WH12> of my kindred<WH4138>?"

So King<WH4428> Ahasuerus<WH325> said<WH559> to Queen<WH4436> Esther<WH635> and to Mordecai<WH4782> the Jew,<WH3064> "Behold,<WH2009> I have given<WH5414> the house<WH1004> of Haman<WH2001> to Esther,<WH635> and him they have hanged<WH8518> on the gallows<WH6086> because<WH5921> <WH834> he had stretched<WH7971> out his hands<WH3027> against the Jews.<WH3064>

"Now you write<WH3789> to the Jews<WH3064> as you see<WH5869> fit,<WH2896> in the king<WH4428>'s name,<WH8034> and seal<WH2856> [it] with the king's signet<WH2885> ring;<WH2885> for a decree<WH3791> which<WH834> is written<WH3789> in the name<WH8034> of the king and sealed<WH2856> with the king's signet<WH2885> ring<WH2885> may not be revoked.<WH7725>"

So the king's scribes<WH9373> were called<WH7121> at that time<WH6256> in the third<WH7992> month<WH2320> (that is, the month<WH2320> Sivan<WH5510>), on the twenty-third day; and it was written<WH3789> according to all<WH3605> that Mordecai<WH4782> commanded<WH6680> to the Jews,<WH3064> the satraps,<WH323> the governors,<WH6346> and the princes<WH8269> of the provinces<WH4082> which<WH834> [extended] from India<WH1912> to Ethiopia,<WH3568> 127 provinces,<WH4082> to every<WH4082> province<WH4082> according to its script,<WH3791> and to every<WH5971> people<WH5971> according to their language,<WH3956> as well as to the Jews<WH3064> according to their script<WH3791> and their language.<WH3956>

And he wrote<WH3789> in the name<WH8034> of King<WH4428> Ahasuerus,<WH325> and sealed<WH2856> it with the king's signet<WH2885> ring,<WH2885> and sent<WH7971> letters<WH5612> by couriers<WH7323> on horses,<WH5483> riding<WH7392> on steeds<WH7409> sired<WH1121> by the royal<WH7424> stud.<WH7424>

In them the king<WH4428> granted<WH5414> the Jews<WH3064> who<WH834> were in each<WH5892> and every<WH3605> city<WH5892> [the right] to assemble<WH6950> and to defend<WH5975> their lives,<WH5315> to destroy,<WH8045> to kill,<WH2026> and to annihilate the entire<WH6> army<WH3605> of any people<WH2428> or province<WH5971> which might attack<WH4082> them, including<WH9475> children<WH854> and women,<WH2945> and to plunder<WH802> their spoil,<WH962>

on one<WH259> day<WH3117> in all<WH3605> the provinces<WH4082> of King<WH4428> Ahasuerus,<WH325> the thirteenth<WH7969> <WH6240> [day] of the twelfth<WH8147> <WH6240> month<WH2320> (that is, the month<WH2320> Adar<WH143>).

A copy<WH6572> of the edict<WH3791> to be issued<WH5414> as law<WH1881> in each<WH4082> and every<WH3605> province,<WH4082> was published<WH1540> to all<WH3605> the peoples,<WH5971> so that the Jews<WH3064> should be ready<WH6264> for this<WH2088> day<WH3117> to avenge<WH5358> themselves on their enemies.<WH340>

The couriers,<WH7323> hastened<WH926> and impelled<WH1765> by the king's command,<WH1697> went<WH3318> out, riding<WH7392> on the royal<WH327> steeds;<WH7409> and the decree<WH1881> was given<WH5414> out in Susa<WH7800> the capital.<WH1002>

Then Mordecai<WH4782> went<WH3318> out from the presence<WH6440> of the king<WH4428> in royal<WH4438> robes<WH3830> of blue<WH8504> and white,<WH2353> with a large<WH1419> crown<WH5850> of gold<WH2091> and a garment<WH8509> of fine<WH948> linen<WH948> and purple;<WH713> and the city<WH5892> of Susa<WH7800> shouted<WH6670> and rejoiced.<WH8055>
For the Jews<WH3064> there was light<WH9004> and gladness<WH8057> and joy<WH8342> and honor.<WH3366>

And in each<WH4082> and every<WH3605> province,<WH4082> and in each<WH5892> and every<WH3605> city,<WH5892> wherever<WH4725> <WH834> the king's commandment<WH1697> and his decree<WH1881> arrived,<WH5060> there was gladness<WH8057> and joy<WH8342> for the Jews,<WH3064> a feast<WH4960> and a holiday.<WH2896> <WH3117> And many<WH7227> among<WH4480> the peoples<WH5971> of the land<WH776> became<WH3054> Jews,<WH3054> for the dread<WH6343> of the Jews<WH3064> had fallen<WH5307> on them.
